title: Ranked Soloq
body: I've been playing other games which have competitive modes, just as similar to league, with MMR and ranking systems. However League differs in one key feature. When the match is a 4v5, the points u lose in MMR are halved. If it is 3v5 or lower the loss is prevented. The people who have left however are banned for a period of time, and they lose MMR points. Should this be introduced into League? I think it'd be pretty cool.

replies.body: And what game has this feature?
made up one. same way people explain other suggestions that are brain dead stupid.
Even if it is just his suggestion, there's no need to be rude about it. It's better for everyone if you keep a positive atmosphere =).
Sounds good in hindsight, but what if someone actually dc's or such? how can you determine they didn't dc on purpose to avoid being "banned" if they actually did have an outage...
